subject: Re: [PATCH 03/13] libfs: change simple_done_creating() to use end_creating()

reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown suggested that the patch to change simple_done_creating() to use end_creating() should not be made without a good reason or understanding of why it was written that way.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised technical concerns about patches [PATCH 10/13] and [PATCH 03/13], questioning the locking rules in ovl_create_real() and suggesting improvements to code comments.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton suggested a minor improvement to the patch by making simple_done_creating() a static inline function, and also pointed out a small issue in Apparmor's code that needs fixing.
